meanings.sent1: The security guard will gatekeep the entrance to the concert.
meanings.sent2: She gatekeeps the keys to the storage room.
meanings.sent3: The gatekeeper decided to gatekeep the secret recipe to himself.
meanings.sent4: He gatekeeps the information like a fortress protecting its treasures.
meanings.sent5: Gatekeeping the password ensures only authorized users can enter.

meanings.sent1: The librarian gatekeeps the rare books in the library.
meanings.sent2: He gatekeeps the entrance to the exclusive club.
meanings.sent3: The gatekeeper likes to gatekeep the keys just to tease others.
meanings.sent4: She gatekeeps the family secrets with a watchful eye.
meanings.sent5: Gatekeeping the entrance is crucial for security purposes.

meanings.definition: To regulate or limit access to a community or group
meanings.sent1: The community leader gatekeeps who can join the neighborhood watch.
meanings.sent2: They gatekeep the membership to ensure quality standards are met.
meanings.sent3: The gatekeeper decided to gatekeep the number of attendees for safety reasons.
meanings.sent4: He gatekeeps the team roster to maintain a competitive edge.
meanings.sent5: Gatekeeping the group helps maintain a sense of unity and purpose.
